mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock (product_id, quantity, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{productId}, #{delta}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET quantity = stock.quantity + #{delta}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

INSERT INTO stock (product_id, quantity, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{productId}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET quantity = stock.quantity - #{delta}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT quantity FROM stock WHERE product_id = #{productId} FOR UPDATE
